text: A conducting sphere is negatively charged. Which of the following statements is true?

options.a: The charge is uniformly distributed throughout the entire volume
options.b: The charge is located at the center of the sphere
options.c: The charge is located at the bottom of the sphere because of gravity
options.d: The charge is uniformly distributed on the surface of the sphere.

hint: When a conducting sphere get charged, the charge is uniformly distributed on the surface of the sphere.
